allow:
Bash(/tmp/verify_details.ps1 << 'PSEOF'
$remainCount = 0
$mdCount = 0
Get-ChildItem -Path 'C:\\Users\\jacob_arbeit\\Desktop\\kurs-25-06-newlayout\\kurs-25-06\\docs' -Recurse -Filter '*.md' | ForEach-Object {
    $matches_old = \(Select-String -Path $_.FullName -Pattern '^<details> -AllMatches\).Count
    $matches_new = \(Select-String -Path $_.FullName -Pattern '<details markdown>' -AllMatches\).Count
    if \($matches_old -gt 0\) {
        Write-Output "REMAINING <details> in: $\($_.FullName\) \($matches_old occurrences\)"
        $remainCount += $matches_old
    }
    $mdCount += $matches_new
}
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "Total remaining <details> \(exact\): $remainCount"
Write-Output "Total <details markdown> occurrences: $mdCount"
PSEOF)
